game.title: game title

line: The beginning of the game takes place in an enchanted forest, where the player encounters diverse creatures and mystical beings.
After reaching the ancient castle, they uncover a powerful artifact that threatens global harmony. Their quest is to restore peace and safeguard it wisely.

game.beginning: The player starts their journey in the enchanted forest...
game.ending: ... culminating in a final showdown at the castle, where their victory brings back balance to the kingdom.
